SELECT t.id, t.create_time, t.title, t.content, t.transaction_means, t.sender_id, t.receiver_id, t.status, t.deadline, t.max_receiver, t.comment_on_receiver, t.star_for_receiver, t.comment_on_sender, t.star_for_sender, t.quick_accept, t.receiver_confirmed, t.sender_confirmed, t.submit_time, t.receiver_notes, t.sender_contact_info, u.credit as senderCredit FROM task t, user u where t.sender_id = u.id and locate('delivered', t.status) > 0
and t.title like concat('%', #{fuzzyTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by t.create_time
desc
